title: The Triple Monitor Mega MacBook!
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -  Ten One Mountie Clip (USA Link) -  Ten One Mountie Clip (International Link) -   This little Mountie clip allows you to attach mobile devices for use as secondary displays to your MacBook (or other laptop). It works with various devices including iPad (and other tablets) iPhone (and other phones).  From the manufacturer -   Have a little entertainment on the side. Mountie makes it easy to attach movies, sports, tv shows, or second screen to your MacBook or iMac. The simple lever-action makes attachment quick and easy. Multiple included grips means Mountie will accommodate all current and future models of iPad, iPhone, and Macbook.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
